CodeLabel.Label: PpuControl_2000
CodeLabel.Comment: 7 bit 0 ---- ---- VPHB SINN |||| |||| |||| ||++- Base nametable address |||| || (0 = $2000; 1 = $2400; 2 = $2800; 3 = $2C00) |||| |+--- VRAM address increment per CPU read/write of PPUDATA |||| | (0: add 1, going across; 1: add 32, going down) |||| +---- Sprite pattern table address for 8x8 sprites |||| (0: $0000; 1: $1000; ignored in 8x16 mode) |||+------ Background pattern table address (0: $0000; 1: $1000) ||+------- Sprite size (0: 8x8; 1: 8x16) |+-------- PPU master/slave select | (0: read backdrop from EXT pins; 1: output color on EXT pins) +--------- Generate an NMI at the start of the vertical blanking interval (0: off; 1: on)

CodeLabel.Label: PpuMask_2001
CodeLabel.Comment: 7 bit 0 ---- ---- BGRs bMmG |||| |||| |||| |||+- Display type: (0: color, 1: grayscale) |||| ||+-- 1: Show background in leftmost 8 pixels of screen, 0: Hide |||| |+--- 1: Show sprites in leftmost 8 pixels of screen, 0: Hide |||| +---- 1: Show background |||+------ 1: Show sprites ||+------- Emphasize red |+-------- Emphasize green +--------- Emphasize blue

CodeLabel.Label: PpuStatus_2002
CodeLabel.Comment: 7 bit 0 ---- ---- VSO. .... |||| |||| |||+-++++- Least significant bits previously written into a PPU register ||| (due to register not being updated for this address) ||+------- Sprite overflow. The intent was for this flag to be set || whenever more than eight sprites appear on a scanline, but a || hardware bug causes the actual behavior to be more complicated || and generate false positives as well as false negatives; see || PPU sprite evaluation. This flag is set during sprite || evaluation and cleared at dot 1 (the second dot) of the || pre-render line. |+-------- Sprite 0 Hit. Set when a nonzero pixel of sprite 0 overlaps | a nonzero background pixel; cleared at dot 1 of the pre-render | line. Used for raster timing. +--------- Vertical blank has started (0: not in vblank; 1: in vblank). Set at dot 1 of line 241 (the line *after* the post-render line, false); cleared after reading $2002 and at dot 1 of the pre-render line.

CodeLabel.Label: OamAddr_2003
CodeLabel.Comment: Set OAM address - Write only

CodeLabel.Label: OamData_2004
CodeLabel.Comment: Read/Write OAM data

CodeLabel.Label: PpuScroll_2005
CodeLabel.Comment: Set PPU scroll, write twice - Write only

CodeLabel.Label: PpuAddr_2006
CodeLabel.Comment: Set PPU address, write twice - Write only

CodeLabel.Label: PpuData_2007
CodeLabel.Comment: Read/Write VRAM

CodeLabel.Label: Sq0Duty_4000
CodeLabel.Comment: DDLC VVVV Duty (D), envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq0Sweep_4001
CodeLabel.Comment: EPPP NSSS Sweep unit: enabled (E), period (P), negate (N), shift (S)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq0Timer_4002
CodeLabel.Comment: TTTT TTTT Timer low (T)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq0Length_4003
CodeLabel.Comment: LLLL LTTT Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq1Duty_4004
CodeLabel.Comment: DDLC VVVV Duty (D), envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq1Sweep_4005
CodeLabel.Comment: EPPP NSSS Sweep unit: enabled (E), period (P), negate (N), shift (S)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq1Timer_4006
CodeLabel.Comment: TTTT TTTT Timer low (T)

CodeLabel.Label: Sq1Length_4007
CodeLabel.Comment: LLLL LTTT Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

CodeLabel.Label: TrgLinear_4008
CodeLabel.Comment: CRRR RRRR Length counter halt / linear counter control (C), linear counter load (R)

CodeLabel.Label: TrgTimer_400A
CodeLabel.Comment: TTTT TTTT Timer low (T)

CodeLabel.Label: TrgLength_400B
CodeLabel.Comment: LLLL LTTT Length counter load (L), timer high (T)

CodeLabel.Label: NoiseVolume_400C
CodeLabel.Comment: --LC VVVV Envelope loop / length counter halt (L), constant volume (C), volume/envelope (V)

CodeLabel.Label: NoisePeriod_400E
CodeLabel.Comment: L--- PPPP Loop noise (L), noise period (P)

CodeLabel.Label: NoiseLength_400F
CodeLabel.Comment: LLLL L--- Length counter load (L)

CodeLabel.Label: DmcFreq_4010
CodeLabel.Comment: IL-- RRRR IRQ enable (I), loop (L), frequency (R)

CodeLabel.Label: DmcCounter_4011
CodeLabel.Comment: -DDD DDDD Load counter (D)

CodeLabel.Label: DmcAddress_4012
CodeLabel.Comment: AAAA AAAA Sample address (A)

CodeLabel.Label: DmcLength_4013
CodeLabel.Comment: LLLL LLLL Sample length (L)

CodeLabel.Label: SpriteDma_4014
CodeLabel.Comment: Writing $XX will upload 256 bytes of data from CPU page $XX00-$XXFF to the internal PPU OAM.

CodeLabel.Label: ApuStatus_4015
CodeLabel.Comment:
Read: IF-D NT21 DMC interrupt (I), frame interrupt (F), DMC active (D), length counter > 0 (N/T/2/1)
Write: ---D NT21 Enable DMC (D), noise (N), triangle (T), and pulse channels (2/1)

CodeLabel.Label: Ctrl1_4016
CodeLabel.Comment:
Read (NES - input): ---4 3210 Read data from controller port #1.
Write: ---- ---A Output data (strobe) to both controllers.

CodeLabel.Label: Ctrl2_FrameCtr_4017
CodeLabel.Comment:
Read (NES - input): ---4 3210 Read data from controller port #2.
Write (Frame counter): MI-- ---- Mode (M, 0 = 4-step, 1 = 5-step), IRQ inhibit flag (I)
